article:
Births
* 496 BC – Sophocles, Athenian dramatist and statesman
* c. 495 BC ** Pericles, Athenian politician (d. 429 BC) ** Zeno of Elea, Greek
  philosopher (d. c. 430 BC)
* c. 490 BC ** Empedocles, Greek philosopher (d. c. 430 BC) ** Phidias, Greek
  sculptor (d. c. 430 BC)

Deaths
* 498 BC – Amyntas I, king of Macedonia
* 496 BC ** Pythagoras, Greek philosopher and mathematician ** Sun Tzu, general,
  military strategist, and author of [[The Art of War]] (traditional date)
* 491 BC– Hippocrates, Tyrant of Gela

References
